MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode.summary: The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode interface represents an audio destination consisting of a WebRTC with a single AudioMediaStreamTrack, which can be used in a similar way to a MediaStream obtained from .

remarks.para: It is an that acts as an audio destination, created using the method.

MediaStreamAudioDestinationNodeMediaStre.summary: The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new object instance.

MediaStreamAudioDestinationNodeStream.summary: The stream property of the interface represents a containing a single audio with the same number of channels as the node itself.

remarks.para: You can use this property to get a stream out of the audio graph and feed it into another construct, such as a Media Recorder.

MediaStreamAudioDestinationNodeStream.value: A containing a single audio track. The audio track is a whose is audio.
